calls.aura_seer: Aura Seer open your eyes, check a player.
calls.beholder: Beholder open your eyes, (point the player) this is the village seer.
calls.bloody_mary: (When she is already dead), choose a player to kill.
calls.bodyguard: Wake up Bodyguard, choose a player to protect.
calls.bogeyman: (If wolves didn't kill) Bogeyman wake up, choose a player to kill.
calls.chupacabra: Chupacabra wake up, choose a player.
calls.count_dracula: Dracula, open your eyes and pick a wife.
calls.cult_leader: Cultists, open your eyes, who's gonna be converted tonight?
calls.dire_wolf: *Wake up Dire Wolf, choose your companion.
calls.doppelganger: *Doppelgänger, open your eyes, choose your role model.
calls.drunk: (Third night), open your eyes, give him his new role.
calls.insomniac: Insomniac, there have been activity around you (tell with hands).
calls.leprechaun: Leprechaun open your eyes, (point the player) this player have been killed, will you redirect the attack?
calls.mason: *Masons, open your eyes and look for other Masons.
calls.meeting: Masons, open your eyes it's meeting time.
calls.minion: *Minion, you are part of the (moderator choose vampires or werewolves) team.
calls.nostradamus: *Nostradamus, open your eyes, predict the winning team.
calls.old_hag: Old Hag open your eyes, who must leave the village next day?
calls.p_i: Private Investigator wake up, inspect a player and his neighbors.
calls.priest: Priest, for whom do you pray?
calls.seer: Wake up Seer, check a player.
calls.sorcerer: (Until found a werewolf, after that join wolves and ask before they choose) wake up sorcerer, point at a player.
calls.spellcaster: Spellcaster, who must not use their voice the following day?
calls.the_count: *The Count, there is (show with hands) wolves in this side of the village and (show with hands) in the other side.
calls.thing: Thing, tap a player next to you.
calls.vampire: Vampires, *(open your eyes and look for other vampires.), choose a player to kill.
calls.werewolves: Werewolves, *(open your eyes and look for other werewolves.), choose a player to kill.
calls.witch: Witch open your eyes, (point the player) this player have been killed, do you want to revive him? (one per game), do you want to kill someone else? (one per game).

calls.aura_seer: Vidente Aura levántate, verifica un jugador.
calls.beholder: Espectador abre tus ojos, este es el Vidente de la aldea.
calls.bloody_mary: (Cuando ya está muerta), Bloody Mary seleciona a quien matarás.
calls.bodyguard: levántate Escolta, elige a quien vas a resguardar.
calls.bogeyman: (Si los lobos no mataron!) Se levanta El Cuco, elige a quien matar.
calls.chupacabra: Se levanta el Chupacabra, selecciona un jugador.
calls.count_dracula: Dracula, abre tus ojos y escoge a tu esposa.
calls.cult_leader: Cultistas, abran sus ojos, a quién van a incluir al culto?
calls.cupid: *Se levanta Cupido, elige a los enamorados.
calls.dire_wolf: *Se levanta el Lobo Gigante, selecciona su compañía.
calls.doppelganger: *Doppelgänger, abre tus ojos, selecciona tu modelo a seguir.
calls.drunk: (Tercera noche), Borracho abre tus ojos, recibe tu nuevo rol.
calls.insomniac: Insomne, ha habido actividad a tu alrededor (indicarlo con las manos).
calls.leprechaun: Duende abre tus ojos, (apunta al jugador) ha sido asesinado, vas a reorientar su muerte?
calls.mason: *Masones, abran sus ojos y conozcan los otros masones.
calls.meeting: Masones, es hora de su reunión.
calls.minion: *Lacayo, servirás a los (el moderador elige vampiros o lobos).
calls.old_hag: Vieja Arpía despierta, quién no será parte de la villa durante el día?
calls.p_i: Despierta Investigador Privado, inspecciona un jugador y sus vecinos.
calls.seer: Se levante el Vidente, verifica un jugador.
calls.sorcerer: (Hasta que encuentre un lobo, luego se une a la manada y consutla antes de que los lobos seleccionen) Despierta Hechicra, apunta a un jugador.
calls.spellcaster: Conjurador, quién no podrá usar su voz durante el día?
calls.the_count: *Contador, la aldea ha sido invadida por (indicar la cantidad con las manos) lobos en esta parte y (indicar con las manos) en esta otra.
calls.thing: Mañoso, toca un jugador a tu alrededor.
calls.vampire: Vampiros, *(abran sus ojos y miren los demás vampiros.), seleccionen a quien matar.
calls.werewolves: Lobos, *(abran sus ojos y miren los demás lobos.), seleccionen a quien matar.
calls.wild_child: *Chico Salvaje, selecciona tu rol a seguir.
calls.witch: Bruja despierta, (señala el jugador) este jugador ha muerto, lo revives? (uno por juego), matarás a alguien? (uno por juego).
